Title: Earthlings
Writer: Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story by), Ben Levin (story by), Rebecca Sugar (story by), Ian Jones-Quartey (story by), Kat Morris (story by), Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Zach Callison, Dee Bradley Baker, Kimberly Brooks, Michaela Dietz
Plot: After finding Jasper once again, but now in the Beta Kindergarten, Steven and Amethyst face off with her. Jasper had been trapping corrupted gems in holes around the Kindergarten to use as an army. Be prepared for a battle.
